name: Captain America & Winter Soldier Deck
author: Werd Web Dev
description: Epic Duelsâ€“compatible deck for Captain America and the Winter Soldier.

cards.name: Fortified Shield
cards.rulesText: Reduce the next 2 damage to Captain America or an adjacent ally until your next turn.

cards.name: Shield Intercept
cards.rulesText: Move up to 2 squares toward a targeted ally and become the new target of that attack.

cards.name: Rallying Command
cards.rulesText: Winter Soldier draws 2 cards and gains +1 attack die on his next strike.

cards.name: Strategic Redeploy
cards.rulesText: Move Winter Soldier up to 3 squares; he then draws 1 card.

cards.name: Precision Strike
cards.rulesText: Add +3 attack dice to Captain America's next attack; ignore defense bonuses.

cards.name: Shield Ricochet
cards.rulesText: Make a ranged attack that bounces to a second enemy within 2 squares.

cards.name: Avengers Assemble
cards.rulesText: Both heroes draw 1 card, move 1 square, and may each make 1 basic attack.

cards.name: Rapid Fire
cards.rulesText: Add +2 attack dice to Winter Soldier's next ranged attack.

cards.name: Adaptive Arsenal
cards.rulesText: Retrieve one combat card from your discard pile to your hand before attacking.

cards.name: Tactical Scan
cards.rulesText: Look at the top 3 cards of any deck, reorder them, then draw 1 card.

cards.name: Bionic Lunge
cards.rulesText: Move up to 3 squares and make a melee attack with +1 attack die.

cards.name: Ghost Protocol
cards.rulesText: If Winter Soldier isn't adjacent to allies, he gains +1 defense until your next turn.

cards.name: Silent Strike
cards.rulesText: If Winter Soldier is alone, add +3 attack dice.

cards.name: Brothers in Arms
cards.rulesText: Playable by either figure: until end of turn, when one hero attacks, the other may immediately play a combat card as if adjacent.
